script.title: SDF Download
script.description: Download SDF reports into a BigQuery table.
instructions: Select your filter types and the filter ideas.
Select the file types you want from the sdf.
The job will grab the entire sdf and upload to your table.
The job will append an underscore and the file type to the provided table name for the result table.

field.name: version
field.description: The sdf version to be returned.

field.name: file_types
field.description: The sdf file types to be returned.

field.name: filter_type
field.description: The filter type for the filter ids.

field.name: filter_ids
field.description: The filter ids for the request.

field.name: dataset
field.description: Dataset to be written to in BigQuery.

field.name: table
field.description: Table to be written to in BigQuery.

field.name: is_time_partition
field.description: Whether the end table is time partitioned.
